#summary Description of the /table/list/ page.
#labels Phase-Design

=== Introduction ===
The table list page is used to list all tables on the server.

=== Method ===
HTTP GET 

=== Response ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tables>
 <table>-895775123216846124</table>
 <table>-8654132154231524545</table>
 <table>1245846435468464</table>
</tables>
}}}
